de.upb.m2m.quality.configurator.jobs.utils
Class QVTOLogger

java.lang.Object
  de.upb.m2m.quality.configurator.jobs.utils.QVTOLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.m2m.qvt.oml.util.Log
public class QVTOLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.m2m.qvt.oml.util.Log

A simple implementation of QVT-O's logger interface. Basically sets up the QVT-O logger such that the logger of the M2M Quality framework is applied.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Sebastian Lehrig (lehrig@mail.upb.de)
